column4: I want to use airodump to dump wifi packets but I cannot as it thinks I am trying to use an ethernet adapter...
I cannot connect to wifi networks because of it
I am using the wl driver from broadcom
I do not want to use the ndiswrapper
tried that it didn't show my wifi card in iwconfig
I am using a driver from broadcom's site
it's called wl, thats all I know
I downloaded it from broadcom and compiled it then took the ko file and added it to my modules, etc.
Hold on, googling for that problem
I've been googling all day with no avail.
